Symbol.Script_1D:
show_el = -1 n_view = "" : success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-km", "n_view", n_view) if vartype(n_view)=1 then n_view = str("%.0",n_view) space = " " : var = n_view : gosub "trim_space" : n_view = var space = " " : var = n_view : gosub "trim_space" : n_view = var n_view_emp = (n_view="0" or n_view="" or n_view=" " or n_view="-")
el_views_emp = 0 for i=1 to vardim1(el_views) space = " " : var = el_views[i] : gosub "trim_space" : el_views[i] = var space = " " : var = el_views[i] : gosub "trim_space" : el_views[i] = var el_views_emp = el_views_emp + (el_views[i]="0" or el_views[i]="" or el_views[i]=" " or el_views[i]="-") next i if el_views_emp=vardim1(el_views) then el_views_emp = 1 else el_views_emp = 0 endif
if not(el_views_emp) and not(n_view_emp) and show_el<0 then for i=1 to vardim1(el_views) if n_view=el_views[i] and show_el<0 then show_el = 0 if STRSTR(el_views[i],"*")>0 and show_el<0 then space = "*" : var = el_views[i] : gosub "trim_space" : el_views[i] = var space = "*" : var = el_views[i] : gosub "trim_space" : el_views[i] = var if STRSTR(n_view,el_views[i])>0 then show_el = 0 endif if show_el=0 then i = vardim1(el_views) next i endif
if STRSTR(n_view,"*")>0 and not(el_views_emp) and not(n_view_emp) and show_el<0 then space = "*" : var = n_view : gosub "trim_space" : n_view = var space = "*" : var = n_view : gosub "trim_space" : n_view = var for i=1 to vardim1(el_views) if STRSTR(el_views[i],n_view)>0 then show_el = 0 if show_el=0 then i = vardim1(el_views) next i endif
if n_view="-1" and show_el<0 then if el_views_emp then show_el = 1 else show_el = 0 endif endif if n_view="-2" and show_el<0 then if el_views_emp then show_el = 0 else show_el = 1 endif endif if el_views_emp and show_el<0 then show_el = 1 if n_view_emp and show_el<0 then show_el = 1 if show_el<0 then show_el = 1 parameters show_el = show_el end show_el
"trim_space": if vartype(var) = 2 then DO is_trim = 0 lvar = strlen(var) is_first_space = (strstr(STRSUB (var, 1, 1),space)>0) is_end_space = (strstr(STRSUB (var, lvar, 1),space)>0) if is_first_space then var = STRSUB (var, 2, lvar-1) lvar = strlen(var) endif if is_end_space then var = STRSUB (var, 1, lvar-1) is_trim = is_first_space + is_end_space WHILE is_trim <> 0 endif return
Symbol.Script_VL: if vardim1(el_views)<=1 then dim el_tmp[] for i=1 to 20 el_tmp[i] = " " next i parameters el_views = el_tmp endif
